item.title: Learnings of the Day 11/12
item.description: Problem solving’s 1. Repeated Substring Pattern leetcode Code: bool repeatedSubstringPattern(char s[]){ char b[50]; for(int i=0;i<50;i++) { b[i]=0; } for(int i=0;s[i];i++) { int k=s[i]-'a'; b[k]++; } for(int i=0;i<50;i++) { if(b[i]!=0) { int a=b[1]; while(b[i]==a) { return true; } } } return false; } Modifications: Then corrected version of code in a previous response. bool repeatedSubstringPattern(char s[]) { int len = strlen(s); for (int i = 1; i <= len / 2; i++) { if (len % i == 0) { int numRepeats = len / i; bool isRepeated = true; for (int j = i; j < len; j++) { if (s[j] !
